LuckyDraw.title: Lucky Draw Tool
LuckyDraw.description: A cool lucky draw tool that supports importing a list of names and presenting the draw process in a 3D sphere animation.
LuckyDraw.inputPlaceholder: Enter participant names, one per line...
LuckyDraw.minParticipants: Number of participants must be greater than winners

LuckyDraw.step3: Click the [Start Draw] button or press the space key to start the draw
LuckyDraw.step4: View the results, export the winner list or draw again
LuckyDraw.featureImportDesc: Support manual input, Excel spreadsheet import, and TXT text import
LuckyDraw.featureAnimationDesc: Participants are displayed in a 3D sphere, creating an exciting draw process
LuckyDraw.featureRandomizeDesc: Uses high-quality random algorithms to ensure fair results
LuckyDraw.featureExportDesc: Support exporting the list of winners for further processing and record keeping
LuckyDraw.luckyDrawNote: Note: Adjust settings to customize the drawing experience
LuckyDraw.appIntro: This is a feature-rich lucky draw system for events, meetings, or celebrations.

Grid.title: Grid Lottery
Grid.description: Interactive grid-based lottery system with visual participant cards and dynamic drawing effects
Grid.confirmResetMessage: Are you sure you want to reset the lottery? This will clear all winners and restart.
Grid.welcomeMessage: Import participant data to start the grid lottery
Grid.gridLimitWarning: Grid mode limits to a maximum of 100 participants. Currently there are {count} participants. Consider removing excess participants or using Ball mode.

GridDataManager.title: Grid Data Manager
GridDataManager.dragDropFile: Drag and drop Excel file here
GridDataManager.avatarFieldDesc: Optional image URL or file path for participant avatars
GridDataManager.confirmClearAll: Are you sure you want to clear all participant data?

GridHelp.title: Grid Lottery Help
GridHelp.overviewDesc: The Grid Lottery system presents participants in an interactive grid layout with visual cards showing names and avatars. The system supports Excel data import, dynamic visual effects, and customizable lottery settings.
GridHelp.nameFieldHelp: Must contain participant names. Supports column headers like 'Name', '姓名', '名字', 'Participant'
GridHelp.idFieldHelp: Unique identifier for participants. Supports headers like 'ID', '编号', '工号', 'Number'
GridHelp.avatarFieldHelp: Image URL or file path for participant photos. Supports headers like 'Avatar', '头像', 'Photo', 'Image'
GridHelp.tip1: First row should contain column headers
GridHelp.tip2: Name field is required, ID and Avatar are optional
GridHelp.tip3: Invalid image URLs will fallback to colored initials
GridHelp.tip4: Duplicate names will be automatically skipped
GridHelp.phase1Desc: Slow random highlighting (1-2 seconds per flash)
GridHelp.phase2Desc: Gradually increases speed from 0.5s to 0.1s intervals
GridHelp.phase3Desc: Shows final winners with celebration effects
GridHelp.feature1: Responsive grid layout adapts to participant count
GridHelp.feature2: Colored avatar initials for participants without photos
GridHelp.pageTitleDesc: Customize the display title for your lottery event
GridHelp.prizeTypeDesc: Set the prize name (e.g., 'First Prize', 'Grand Prize')
GridHelp.winnerCountDesc: Number of winners to select in each drawing
GridHelp.removeWinnersDesc: Whether to remove winners from future drawings
GridHelp.note1: All settings and data are saved to browser local storage
GridHelp.note2: Large images may affect performance - use optimized images
GridHelp.note3: Grid layout automatically adjusts based on screen size
GridHelp.note4: Winners are highlighted and stored in drawing history

Home.title: Lucky Draw System
Home.subtitle: Professional Multi-Mode Lottery Platform
Home.description: Choose from our powerful lottery modes designed for different scenarios and audiences

ballMode.title: 3D Ball Lottery
ballMode.subtitle: Immersive 3D Experience
ballMode.description: Stunning 3D sphere animation with floating participant names. Perfect for large events, annual meetings, and formal ceremonies.
ballMode.bestFor: Large events, annual meetings, formal ceremonies

gridMode.title: Grid Card Lottery
gridMode.subtitle: Interactive Visual Cards
gridMode.description: Clean grid layout with participant cards showing names and avatars. Ideal for team events, workshops, and interactive presentations.

wheelMode.title: Wheel Lottery
wheelMode.subtitle: Spinning Wheel
wheelMode.description: Classic spinning wheel with colorful segments and exciting animations. Perfect for entertainment events, game shows, and casual lottery draws.
wheelMode.bestFor: Entertainment events, game shows, small groups, casual lottery

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.description: Choose your preferred lottery mode and start creating memorable experiences for your audience
getStarted.tip: Both modes support the same data import formats and winner management features
